description: Nepa AB engages in the provision of research, consultation and information technology services. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 232 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2016-04-26. The firm operates as a developer of software and online tracking solutions for analysis of big data and customer behavior data. The firm's main solutions are focused on statistical analysis of customer interaction data. The firm's ActionHub product is a platform for research that is trigger-based where surveys are triggered by store-visits, purchases, surfing onto a site or any other kind of customer behavior that can be registered. The firm's solutions are used by number of industries, such as retail, media and entertainment, telecommunications, fast moving consumer goods (FMCG), marketing agencies and financial services, among others.
name: Nepa AB
